H0.text: At which school was Billy Bunter a pupil. St. Dominic's

H1.text: At which school was Billy Bunter a pupil. Malvern House

H2.text: At which school was Billy Bunter a pupil. Bramblebury

H3.text: At which school was Billy Bunter a pupil. GREYFRIARS

A4.text: Billy Bunter of Greyfriars School was broadcast as a BBC television series from 19 February 1951 to 22 July 1961.
